算法概要

问题定义

假设矩阵 \(\mathcal{A}\) 是 \(I\times K\) 维，其元素记为 $a_{i,k}，其中 \(0\leq i<I\)，\(0\leq k<K\)；向量是 \(\mathcal{B}\) 维，其元素记为 \(b_{k,0}\)，其中 \(0\leq k<I\)。

  • Square Matrix \(\mathcal{A}\) has dimension \(I\times I\) with elements \(a(i,k)\) for \(0\leq i<I\) and \(0\leq k<I\).
  • Column Vector \(\mathcal{B}\) has dimension \(I\times 1\) with elements \(b(k,0)\) for \(0\leq k<I\).

We then find:

  • Column Vector $ = $ has dimension $ I1 $ with elements $ c(i,0) $ defined as: $ c(i,0)=_{k=0}^{I-1} a(i,k)*b(k,0) $.
  • We split $ $ and $ $ into blocks (sub-matrices) small enough so that a pair of blocks can be multiplied in memory on a single node in the cluster and the computation only includes one phase .

Notation:

  • $ I $: the dimension of square matrix or column vector.
  • $ =a(i,k)^{II} $: square matrix
  • $ =b(k,0)^{I1} $: column vector.
  • $ =c(i,0)^{I1} $: column vector.
  • $ IB $: the number of rows per $ $ block and $ $ block.
  • $ KB $: the number of columns per $ $ block.
  • $ NIB $: the number of $ $ row and $ $ row partitions = $ +1 $.

Example

  • Naive Method: \[ \begin{bmatrix} 1 & 2 & 3 & 4\\ 2 & 3 & 4 & 1\\ 3 & 4 & 1 & 2\\ 4 & 3 & 2 & 1\\\end{bmatrix}\times \begin{bmatrix}1\\3\\2\\4\end{bmatrix} =\begin{bmatrix}29\\23\\25\\21 \end{bmatrix} \]
  • Block Strategy: \[ \left[\begin{array}{cc|cc}1 & 2 & 3 & 4\\2 & 3 & 4 & 1\\\hline3 & 4 & 1 & 2\\ 4 & 3 & 2 & 1\\\end{array}\right]\times \left[\begin{array}{c}1\\3\\\hline2\\4\end{array}\right]= \left[\begin{array}{c}7\\11\\\hline 15\\13\end{array}\right]+ \left[\begin{array}{c}22\\12\\\hline 10\\8\end{array}\right]= \left[\begin{array}{c}29\\23\\\hline 25\\21\end{array}\right] \]
